text: we believe this was the Islamic Front
because they are the source for all the
pictures the rather dramatic image of
this huge shower of masonry being thrown
high into the air over Aleppo comes from
them it's also well known that they've
tunneled under the hotel they did it a
year ago trying to blow up the hotel a
year ago it's not clear what exactly the
target was clearly the hotel was
demolished but it might be that the
Islamic Front were trying to destroy the
tunnels they themselves built a year ago
to stop those tunnels being used by
government forces and that there are
also reports about troops being killed
that may be slightly the wrong term
since we are told by local people that
this was not the Syrian army in that
hotel but the paramilitary shabiha or
ghosts who are much feared and much
hated in opposition areas so the the
details are still a little sketchy what
it does tell you is how fierce and
intense the struggle for Aleppo remains
it's been two years of fighting there
now the front lines have hardly moved
although the rebels have made some
incremental gains over the past few
weeks and months perhaps the government
was about to hit back if the claim that
we're hearing from the ground about
these tunnels being destroyed to stop a
government offensive is true
